scripts.release-prerelease: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version prerelease --preid beta; npm run release;
scripts.release-patch: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version patch; npm run release;
scripts.release-patch-beta: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version prepatch --preid beta; npm run release;
scripts.release-minor: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version minor; npm run release;
scripts.release-minor-beta: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version preminor --preid beta; npm run release;
scripts.release-major: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version major; npm run release;
scripts.release-major-beta: npm run build && npm run commit && npm version premajor --preid beta; npm run release;
scripts.release: npm run commit; npm publish; git push --follow-tags;
